data.comment: The match is underway at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 2, Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 4, Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
An attacking Nagoya player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 7, Mu Kanazaki smashes in a penalty at Kashima Soccer Stadium. The score is now 0-1.
Yusuke Araki awards Kashima a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Yusuke Araki signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kashima's half.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Nagoya at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kashima.
Leo Silva (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 12, Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Nagoya have a dangerous throw-in.
Yusuke Araki signals a throw-in for Nagoya, close to Kashima's area.
In the minute 13, Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 14, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
In the minute 18, Throw-in Kashima.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Nagoya's half?
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Throw-in for Nagoya at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Nagoya is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Nagoya to take a throw-in in Kashima territory.
In the minute 28, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Kashima.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 32, Play has been interrupted briefly in Kashima to check on Ryuji Izumi, who is grimacing with pain.
The away team replace Oh Jae-suk with Yutaka Yoshida.
Kashima make their first substitution with Ryotaro Araki replacing Ryuji Izumi.
In the minute 34, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashima's Juan Alano breaks free at Kashima Soccer Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Nagoya at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 38, Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Nagoya in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
Yusuke Araki signals a Kashima throw-in in Nagoya's half.
Free kick Kashima.
In the minute 42, Kashima are in shooting range from this free kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Kashima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
In the minute 44, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kashima.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
At Kashima Soccer Stadium, Everaldo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half has started.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
In the minute 49, Nagoya needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
Nagoya advance rapidly upfield but Yusuke Araki blows for offside.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 52, Throw-in for Nagoya in the half of Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Yusuke Araki awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 53, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Kashima.
Yusuke Araki signals a Nagoya throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Kashima close to the penalty box.
Kashima drive upfield and Ryotaro Araki gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Nagoya defender.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Kashima.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
Kashima have been awarded a corner by Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 60, Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
Zago is making the team's second substitution at Kashima Soccer Stadium with Yasushi Endo replacing Shoma Doi.
In the minute 61, Free kick Nagoya.
Zago (Kashima) is making a third substitution, with Ayase Ueda replacing Leo Silva.
Juan Alano is booked for the home team.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 63, Yusuke Araki awards Nagoya a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 66, Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Nagoya's half?
Nagoya have a goal kick.
Nagoya awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 67, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya.
Free kick for Nagoya in the half of Kashima.
He's off! Juan Alano is shown a second yellow card.
In the minute 70, In Kashima a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Shumpei Naruse (Nagoya) has received a first yellow card.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 71, Yusuke Araki waits before resuming play because Mitch Langerak for Nagoya is still down.
Mitch Langerak is back on the pitch.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 75, Kashima to take a throw-in in Nagoya territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Nagoya goal kick.
The away team have replaced Takuji Yonemoto with Joao Schmidt. This is the second substitution made today by Massimo Ficcadenti.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Kashima just outside Nagoya's area.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 78, Can Nagoya get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
In the minute 81, Corner awarded to Nagoya.
Throw-in for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Hiroyuki Abe (Nagoya) has received a yellow card from Yusuke Araki.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Nagoya.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
Goal kick for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
In the minute 84, Shintaro Nago is replacing Katsuya Nagato for Kashima at Kashima Soccer Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kashima.
The home team have replaced Kei Koizumi with Yuta Matsumura. This is the fifth substitution made today by Zago.
In the minute 86, Yusuke Araki signals a free kick to Nagoya in their own half.
Throw-in Nagoya.
Nagoya awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 88, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Nagoya close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Nagoya in their own half.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The match has come to a close in Kashima. The final score is 0-2.
It's now 0-2 in Kashima as Mateus scores for Nagoya.
Hiroyuki Abe instrumental with a fine assist.
